website_summaries.verdict: Beautiful color combination of rose gold and dark blue. Owners love the lightweight feel of the watch.
pros: Watch goes with all kinds of outfits, owners say
GUESS brand well known for style and elegance
Owners say they receive many compliments
cons: Some owners say they don't like the watch face's large size
Small extra dials on face are tough to read

customer_reviews.title: I bought thiswatch 2 months ago and i love love love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch 2 months ago and i love love love it! everyday i got a lot of compliments!
customer_reviews.author: yvonne

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: JUST STUNNING. AND NO PROBLEM WITH REMOVING LINKS AS IT WORKS LIKE A REGULAR WATCH STRAP WITH A BUNCH OF HOLES FOR ADJUSTMENT. I HAVE SKINNY WRISTS SO I USE THE SMALLEST OPTION AND IT FITS PERFECTLY.
customer_reviews.author: B. SCHNEIDER

customer_reviews.title: Great looking!
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid that the band wouldn't be dressy enough compared to the rest but it really all goes together beautifully. It's my new favorite watch!
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Cali

customer_reviews.title: That red line and the scratches that the other person ...
customer_reviews.text: That red line and the scratches that the other person pointed out as a flaw is simply a protective plastic coating which needs to be peeled off. Mine came with the line and scratches but once I took the protective film off it was in pristine condition.. High shine scratch free steel
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: After 2 tries it’s a no go so sending back for refund!
customer_reviews.text: This was a the 2nd watch,had to return the 1st one,and the replacement is doing the exact same thing! Can’t get it to keep time,the time I set to last night is still set at the same time this morning. All of the amazon support reps says”pull the crown in and out”done that and nothing! So this will be returned AGAIN for a refund this time!
customer_reviews.author: dawn I

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch!
customer_reviews.text: Will be giving as a gift, so I can't speak to how it fits, or what the longstanding quality will be like. I can say that it is gorgeous and flawless. I love the rose gold. As I was ordering, I wished I could see images of the packaging, so I've added images of what the packaging looks like. There was no plastic seal around the box, so I went ahead and opened it even though I'm giving it as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: My New Favorite
customer_reviews.text: I love my new watch, it is an original Guess watch, just as described. Very comfortable, with a sporty yet casual look. The owner send you a thank message with a picture of the very adorable office dog. Thank you, will order from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a dead battery, the dial would not move the date hand and when I pushed the pin in and out to adjust time, the face plate moved around inside. Total junk, Amazon issued a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Great, comfortable watch..love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great watch..very comfortable. Has nice weight but not to heavy. Normally I can't wait to take my watch off at end of day but not this one! Very nice and a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Iponder

customer_reviews.title: Kool Look
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a birthday gift for my wife. She was looking for a new watch and likes the guess quality. According to he the metal color didn't match the picture but other than this a great bargain because we looked all over Las Vegas shopping malls for similar watches but hundreds of $$$ more. Thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Ed Reynoso

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love with this watch, although i didn't prefer ruber watches. I was always trying to avoid it. But honestly this watch is so elegant yet has a touch of sporty. So it simply fulfill all your days.
customer_reviews.author: Shereen El Mahdy

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch, poor strap, broke in under 1 year use.
customer_reviews.text: Nice style, but wrist band didn't even last one year. At this price I expected better.
customer_reviews.author: Edward J.

customer_reviews.title: It's gone for a couple dips in water (I'm sorry my pretty..
customer_reviews.text: I get compliments every single time I wear this, literally. Looks so fancy and yet half the time I forget I'm wearing it. It's gone for a couple dips in water (I'm sorry my pretty ...sobs) and yet it lives! Must have ladies and gents.
customer_reviews.author: jesus robles

customer_reviews.title: Need replacement loop
customer_reviews.text: Totally love this watch ... I've had it a while now and still works very well and in great condition... my only problem now is that I need to replace the loop that holds the strap down... any ideas as to where I can get one that matches in color and size?
customer_reviews.author: janelle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wife really likes her anniversary gift. The face is a tad large for a small lady's wrist, though.
customer_reviews.author: James D. Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: not ok missing piece of watchband in a couples days

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love when I saw him online! I love! It is very cute!

customer_reviews.title: The one I kept!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice watch! For men too! His and hers anniversary gifts. They look clean.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for friend in Vietnam. She loves it and wears it all the time.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a gift.
customer_reviews.text: "Miss I like your watch" I lost count on how many people have told me this! I just love this and it is very comfortable around my wrist! I just love it.
customer_reviews.author: KungFu Len

customer_reviews.title: If they were blue or black it would be better.
customer_reviews.text: I can't see the dials very well because they are gold. If they were blue or black it would be better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really liked this, but the navy silicone band looked more ...
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this, but the navy silicone band looked more like a dusty, muted color than it appears in these pictures.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really nice watch, my wife love it. Fast shipping,exactly as described. Thank you

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gorgeous! Super comfortable matches all my rose gold perfectly! This sexy watch is my new favorite!

customer_reviews.title: it is very light and comfortable and it is the perfect size not too big ...
customer_reviews.text: One of my favourites by all means, it is very light and comfortable and it is the perfect size not too big not too small , it looks fancy too !

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous watch
customer_reviews.text: Great value for ur money. I give 5 coz I love it.

customer_reviews.title: BAD QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: I bougth this watch 8 months ago, I was in the pool and I used it because it is supposed to be waterproof, in just a few minutes the water entered and it does not work!!!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Looks even better than in the picture
customer_reviews.text: Looks even better than in the picture. Wonderful material. Fits perfectly. Same color as in the picture. I am so happy about it :)(

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: The watch looks very elegant on you wrist, but the box that came with it wasn't for this product, too big and looked very cheap. At one point I wondered if this watch was genuine. Please provide the actual box for this product, otherwise I liked the watch
